thread.title: Karisma Kapoor: I haven't decided anything on my comeback
thread.title_full: Karisma Kapoor: I haven't decided anything on my comeback - Entertainment

author: PTI
title: Karisma Kapoor: I haven't decided anything on my comeback
text:
Indore: Bollywood actress Karisma Kapoor has kept all her options open for a comeback into the industry but at the same time says her kids are priority.
"I have not decided anything regarding my comeback into the films and have kept all options open at present," Karisma told reporters after inaugurating a cloth store here.

Karisma Kapoor 
"My kids are small at present and they are my first priority. Whenever I wish I will think over acting in any film," she said.
The 41-year-old actress, daughter of Randhir Kapoor and Babita made her debut with "Prem Quaidi" in 1991.
"I have watched film industry's development very closely. I also got an opportunity to act in films which are women-oriented like the current heroines are doing," the "Coolie No.1" star said.
Karisma has acted in films including "Anadi", "Rajababu", "Sajan Chale Sasural", "Raja Hindustani", "Dil To Pagal Hai," "Fiza" and "Jubeida".
